title: 114_hr5739
content: Help End Assault Rifle Tragedies (HEART) Act of 2016 This bill amends the federal criminal code to make it a crime to knowingly transfer, loan, or dispose of a machinegun or semiautomatic assault weapon to an individual who is known or reasonably believed to be less than 16 years of age. It defines the term quot, semiautomatic assault weapon. quot. A violator is subject to a fine, up to 10 years in prison, or both.
